org.activiti.engine.delegate

Interface TaskListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    public interface TaskListener
extends Serializable
    Author:
    Tom Baeyens

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EVENTNAME_ALL_EVENTS
      Not an actual event, used as a marker-value for TaskListeners that should be called for all events, including EVENTNAME_CREATE, EVENTNAME_ASSIGNMENT and EVENTNAME_COMPLETE and EVENTNAME_DELETE.
      static String EVENTNAME_ASSIGNMENT 
      static String EVENTNAME_COMPLETE 
      static String EVENTNAME_CREATE 
      static String EVENTNAME_DELETE

        static final String EVENTNAME_ALL_EVENTS
        Not an actual event, used as a marker-value for TaskListeners that should be called for all events, including EVENTNAME_CREATE, EVENTNAME_ASSIGNMENT and EVENTNAME_COMPLETE and EVENTNAME_DELETE.
